column1: Little Goat Diner////Best. Bloody Mary. Ever. Words escape me. I didn't think a tomato juice drink could possibly be this delicious
column2: and yet here I stand corrected. No crappy zing-zang mix here
column3: this bloody Mary is out of this world. I think if we could all start the day off with vodka
column7: and miso adorned with a goat cheese stuffed olive and pickled pepper... the world would be a much better place.
